law.catch_line: Reports from districts -- Compliance with KRS 65A.010 to 65A.090.

text.section: The supervisors of the respective soil conservation districts shall submit to the commission such statements, estimates, budgets, and other information at such time and in such manner as the commission requires.
The supervisors of the soil conservation districts shall comply with the provisions of KRS 65A.010 to 65A.090.

law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 40, sec. 71, effective March 21, 2013. -- Created 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 120, sec. 3.
